MATT 6.28 jah bi wastjos ƕa saurgaiþ?
gakunnaiþ blomans haiþjos, ƕaiwa wahsjand;
nih arbaidjand nih spinnand.
MATT 6.29 qiþuh þan izwis þatei nih Saulaumon in allamma wulþau seinamma gawasida sik swe ains þize.
MATT 6.30 jah þande þata hawi haiþjos himma daga wisando jah gistradagis in auhn galagiþ guþ swa wasjiþ, ƕaiwa mais izwis leitil galaubjandans?
MATT 6.31 ni maurnaiþ nu qiþandans:
ƕa matjam aiþþau ƕa drigkam aiþþau ƕe wasjaima?
MATT 6.32 all auk þata þiudos sokjand;
waituh þan atta izwar sa ufar himinam þatei þaurbuþ...
...MATT 7.12 taujaina izwis mans, swa jah jus taujaiþ im:
þata auk ist witoþ jah praufeteis.
MATT 7.13 inngaggaiþ þairh aggwu daur,
unte braid daur jah rums wigs sa brigganda in fralustai, jah managai sind þai inngaleiþandans þairh þata.
MATT 7.14 ƕan aggwu þata daur jah þraihans wigs sa brigganda in libainai, jah fawai sind þai bigitandans þana.
MATT 7.15 atsaiƕiþ sweþauh faura liugnapraufetum þaim izei qimand at izwis in wastjom lambe, iþ innaþro sind wulfos wilwandans.
MATT 7.16 bi akranam ize ufkunnaiþ ins.
ibai lisand af þaurnum weinabasja aiþþau af wigadeinom smakkans?
MATT 7.17 swa all bagme godaize akrana goda gataujiþ, iþ sa ubila bagms akrana ubila gataujiþ.
MATT 7.18 ni mag bagms þiuþeigs akrana ubila gataujan, nih bagms ubils akrana þiuþeiga gataujan.
MATT 7.19 all bagme ni taujandane akran god usmaitada jah in fon atlagjada.
MATT 7.20 þannu bi akranam ize ufkunnaiþ ins.
MATT 7.21 ni ƕazuh saei qiþiþ mis: frauja, frauja! inngaleiþiþ in þiudangardja himine, ak sa taujands wiljan attins meinis þis in himinam.
MATT 7.22 managai qiþand mis in jainamma daga:
frauja, frauja! niu þeinamma namin praufetidedum, jah þeinamma namin unhulþons uswaurpum, jah þeinamma namin mahtins mikilos gatawidedum?
MATT 7.23 jah þan andhaita im þatei
ni ƕanhun kunþa izwis:
afleiþiþ fairra mis, jus waurkjandans unsibjona.
MATT 7.24 ƕazuh nu saei hauseiþ waurda meina jah taujiþ þo, galeiko ina waira frodamma, saei gatimrida razn sein ana staina.
MATT 7.25 jah atiddja dalaþ rign jah qemun aƕos jah waiwoun windos jah bistugqun bi þamma razna jainamma, jah ni gadraus, unte gasuliþ was ana staina.
MATT 7.26 jah ƕazuh saei hauseiþ waurda meina jah ni taujiþ þo, galeikoda mann dwalamma, saei gatimrida razn sein ana malmin.
MATT 7.27 jah atiddja dalaþ rign jah qemun aƕos jah waiwoun windos jah bistugqun bi jainamma razna, jah gadraus, jah was drus is mikils.
MATT 7.28 jah warþ, þan ustauh Iesus þo waurda, biabridedun manageins ana laiseinai is.
MATT 7.29 was auk laisjands ins swe waldufni habands, jah ni swaswe bokarjos.
MATT 8.1 Dalaþ þan atgaggandin imma af fairgunja, laistidedun afar imma iumjons managos.
MATT 8.2 jah sai, manna þrutsfill habands durinnands inwait ina qiþands:
frauja, jabai wileis, magt mik gahrainjan.
MATT 8.3 jah ufrakjands handu attaitok imma qiþands:
wiljau,
wairþ hrains!
jah suns hrain warþ þata þrutsfill is.
MATT 8.4 jah qaþ imma Iesus:
saiƕ ei mann ni qiþais, ak gagg, þuk silban ataugei gudjin jah atbair giba þoei anabauþ Moses du weitwodiþai im.
MATT 8.5 afaruh þan þata innatgaggandin imma in Kafarnaum, duatiddja imma hundafaþs bidjands ina MATT 8.6 jah qiþands:
frauja, þiumagus meins ligiþ in garda usliþa, harduba balwiþs.
MATT 8.7 jah qaþ du imma Iesus:
ik qimands gahailja ina.
MATT 8.8 jah andhafjands sa hundafaþs qaþ:
frauja, ni im wairþs ei uf hrot mein inngaggais, ak þatainei qiþ waurda jah gahailniþ sa þiumagus meins.
MATT 8.9 jah auk ik manna im habands uf waldufnja meinamma gadrauhtins
jah qiþa du þamma: gagg, jah gaggiþ;
